short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the default view into 2 columns

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances your experience on Ayoa by transforming the default view into a two-column layout. With a simple click, it optimizes the workspace for improved productivity and organization, making your Ayoa tasks and activities easier to manage.
